title: Did 35,000 Gulf War soldiers die from the infestation of anthrax?
subtitle: A controversial film indicates that 35,000 members of the service died from the vaccination of anthrax, but we did not find any reasonable support for such an allegation.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: According to a 2008 Government report, 35,000 veterans of the first Gulf war died as a direct result of the harmful effects of the anthrax vaccine they were charged with receiving.
